page.title: 09HOME LIFE - FOOD
page.content:
In 1985 we eat all sorts of {food.}I mainly eat Weetabix for breakfast, and ravioli and brown sauce sandwiches at other times. Weetabix is mainly wheat. Revioli is meat and pasta in a tomato sauce. Brown sauce is made from dates, mustard, garlic and vinegar. Other foods are bacon and eggs, mushrooms, peas and tomatoes. There are lots of meats as well such as shin beef, topside and brisket. People eat a lot of food. In 1984 there was a{water shortage.} Lots of places were affected. You could not have a bath, use a hosepipe or flush the toilet a lot. There are sometimes{droughts}in some countries in the world. These places have to have food flown to them.
Paul Hinett.
